thread.title: Taryn Quinn
thread.title_full: VIP Electronic Cigarette Ireland reviewed by Taryn Quinn

author: Taryn Quinn
title: Taryn Quinn
text: I have bought numerous Electronic Cigarettes from this company. They stopped working shortly after every single time. I will never do business with this company ever again and I recommend that nobody purchases anything from this company!!
